availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas McCurdy Vincent (US Assistant adjutant general, Brigadier General (U.S.A.) )

body.p: Washington, District of Columbia, soldier. Ohio Native. Married to Laura L. Vincent. Father of Thomas N. Vincent. Graduated the United State Military Academy in 1853 as a Second Lieutenant. Served in the United States Second Artillery until 1859. Appointed assistant professor of chemistry at the United States Military Academy in August 1859. Promoted to Captain in August 1861. Promoted to Major in 1862. Served as Assistant Adjutant General from 1861-1865.
